HOME.TITLE: Registration System JISIC
HOME.NAMESMSG: * The name can only contain letters and is required
HOME.LASTNAMESMSG: * The last names can only be letters and is required
HOME.PHONEMSG: * The phone can only contain numbers and is required
HOME.EMAILMSG: * Email must be correct and is required
HOME.IDENTIFICATIONMSG: * The identity card can only contain numbers, have 10 digits and is required
HOME.PASAPORTEMSG: * The passport can only contain letters, numbers and is required
HOME.FILEMSGEPN: Upload the SAEW class schedule in the current academic period in PNG or JPG format
HOME.FILEMSGEXT: Upload a copy of the enrollment at your institution in the current academic period in PNG or JPG format
HOME.FILEMSGAUT: Upload the EasyChair acceptance letter of your paper in PNG or JPG format
HOME.FILEMSGERR: The file can only be in PNG or JPG format
HOME.REGLA1: By registering for an event from the list below, you are already registered for the JISIC, if you register for more than one, you are subject to having incremental payments.
HOME.REGLA2: The registration of EPN Students, External Students will be checked by our staff and if there is any inconsistency, their registration will be rejected.
HOME.REGLA3: Before confirming your registration, please make sure you have selected all the required registrations.
HOME.REGLA4: If you have any problems or concerns regarding the JISIC, contact us at the email jisic@epn.edu.ec, including your personal data.
HOME.ENDREGISTERMSGTEXTERR: You have not selected any product in the cart, go back to step 2 and complete this action
HOME.ENDREGISTERMSGTEXT: Click on the "Send" button to pre-register to the JISIC

FACTURA.MSGTRANSFNUMBER: * The bank transaction number can only contain positive numbers and is required
FACTURA.MSGRUC: * RUC can only contain numbers, have 13 digits and is required
FACTURA.MSGBANKNAME: * The bank name can only contain letters, numbers and is required
